comments.content: <document version="2.0"><paragraph>Problem context: </paragraph><paragraph>This is another exam problem that lets you understand MQA as well as to think about the extremely convenient einsum function in torch along with the concepts of memory access complexity,  computational complexity, and arithmetic intensity. MQA itself is critical since most modern transformer implementations use either MQA or its close cousin GQA.</paragraph><paragraph>Comparing with the previous problem is helpful when you're done to solidify your understanding even better. </paragraph></document>
comments.document:
Problem context: 

This is another exam problem that lets you understand MQA as well as to think about the extremely convenient einsum function in torch along with the concepts of memory access complexity,  computational complexity, and arithmetic intensity. MQA itself is critical since most modern transformer implementations use either MQA or its close cousin GQA.

Comparing with the previous problem is helpful when you're done to solidify your understanding even better.
